title: Looking for straightforward rounded sans serifs
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100510010950im_/http:/typophile.com/files/fontGraz.jpg)

i'm looking for this (or any similiar) clear, rounded font. (it may not be clearly visible, but the above font is rounded)
author: 4myka

comments.content:
thanx Bald Condensed.  
Chevin seems to be the closest except for the "n" & "r" (see image)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100510010950im_/http:/typophile.com/files/chevin.jpg)

do you have any other suggestions ;)
Well, I thought it was going to be a lighter weight of Vega TV, but there don't seem to be any, so frankly I wouldn't know anything closer.
